layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x46
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x46
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x30
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 600x30 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableCol {colgroup} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
          LayoutTableCol {col} at (0,0) size 0x0
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 598x28
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 598x24

              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 188x19
                text run at (2,2) width 188: "Cell text should be right aligned"
